Description.Name: Beta Pod
Description.Details: Beta Pod includes a barracks for eight more mechwarriors which will increase the lavatories and showers too. Plus there is unused space that would make a great hydroponics garden Argo, and a low-g gymnasium just above that. With the Beta pod online you have room for 12 'Mech Pilots.

AssignedCastDescription: Commander, we really need more space for more mechwarriors if we are ever to get them trained for the tenuous times ahead. Remember boot camp? That is what we need to do here find recruits and get them trained, asap.
